content: Configure the invitation options for internal members and external guests of your {{productName}}. These settings can help you comply with your company's security guidelines, for example, if you use LDAP or other user management systems.

comment.text: Configure invitation options for internal members and external guests to comply with security guidelines. This setting is described on the Access Portal settings page, alongside other security categories.

usage.context:
{t("InvitationSettings")}
{t("InvitationSettingsDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName"), })}
